entry.title: The Education (Assisted Places) (Scotland) Amendment (No.2) Regulations 1998
The Parking Attendants (Wearing of Uniforms) (Edinburgh Parking Area) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations prescribe functions during the exercise of which, a parking attendant must wear a uniform.

entry.title: Employment Rights (Dispute Resolution) (1998 Order) (Commencement No. 1 and Transitional and Saving Provisions) Order (Northern Ireland) 1998
entry.summary: This Order bring into operation the provisions of the Employment Rights (Dispute Resolution) (Northern Ireland) Order 1998—

entry.title: The Removal and Disposal of Vehicles (Amendment) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations, extending only to Scotland, amend the Removal and Disposal of Vehicles Regulations 1986.

entry.title: The Local Government (Committees and Political Groups) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Local Government (Committees and Political Groups) Regulations 1990 (“the 1990 Regulations”).

entry.title: The Firearms Rules 1998
entry.summary: These Rules prescribe the forms to be used in connection with the grant of certificates and permits for the purposes of the Firearms Acts 1968 to 1997 and the registration of firearms dealers.

entry.title: The Merchant Shipping (Registration of Ships) (Tonnage Amendment) Regulations 1998
The Social Fund Winter Fuel Payment Amendment Regulations 1998
The Passenger and Goods Vehicles (Recording Equipment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the definition of “the Community Recording Equipment Regulation” in Article 53 of the Road Traffic (Northern Ireland) Order 1995, regulation 2(1) of the Community Drivers' Hours and Recording Equipment (Exemptions and Supplementary Provisions) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1987, regulation 2(1) of the Motor Vehicles (Construction and Use) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1989 and regulation 2(1) of the Passenger and Goods Vehicles (Recording Equipment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1996. The amendments take account of the amendments to Council Regulation (EEC) No. 3821/85 (O.J. No. L370, 31.12.85, p. 8) made by Commission Regulation (EC) No. 2479/95 (O.J. No. L256, 26.10.95, p. 8).

entry.title: The Dartford-Thurrock Crossing Tolls Order 1998
entry.summary: This Order, which comes into force on 1st September 1998, fixes the amounts of the tolls to be paid to use the Dartford-Thurrock Crossing.

entry.title: The Merchant Shipping (Tonnage) (Fishing Vessels) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Merchant Shipping (Tonnage) Regulations 1997 to require a measurement for tonnage of fishing vessels of between 15 or more metres in length overall and 24 metres in length, to be done in the same way as for fishing vessels of 24 metres or more in length, for the purposes of Council Regulation (EEC) No. 2930/86 defining the characteristics of fishing vessels (O.J. No. L274, 25.9.1986, p.1) as amended by Council Regulation (EC) No. O.J. 3259/94 L339, 29.12.94, p.11).

entry.title: Students Awards Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations, which come into operation on 1st September 1998, revoke and replace, with amendments the Students' Awards Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997 as amended by the Students' Awards (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1998 (“the previous Regulations”).

entry.title: The Dartford-Thurrock Crossing Regulations 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations consolidate with minor drafting amendments the Dartford-Thurrock Crossing Regulations 1994 and regulations amending those Regulations between 1995 and 1997. In addition, the following changes of substance are made.

entry.title: Eggs (Marketing Standards) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1998
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Eggs (Marketing Standards) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1995. They make provision for the enforcement and execution of Commission Regulation (EC) No. 505/98 amending Regulation (EEC) No. 1274/91 introducing detailed rules for implementing Council Regulation (EEC) No. 1907/90 on certain marketing standards for eggs (regulation 2). Regulation (EC) No. 505/98 is concerned with record keeping requirements and supervision in the case of eggs marketed with an indication of the type of farming used.

entry.title: The A406 Trunk Road (Hanger Lane, Ealing) Red Route (Prohibited Turns) Traffic Order 1998
The Income Tax (Employments) (Notional Payments) (Amendment) Regulations 1998
The Deregulation (Exchangeable Driving Licences) Order 1998
entry.summary: This Order reduces the burden upon persons holding driving licences issued by countries or territories outside the European Economic Area and wishing to acquire a British licence.

entry.title: The Special Immigration Appeals Commission Act 1997 (Commencement No. 2) Order 1998
The Superannuation (Admission to Schedule 1 to the Superannuation Act 1972) (No. 2) Order 1998
The Crime and Disorder Act 1998 (Commencement No. 1) Order 1998
